Package io.atlasmap.converters

Class DateTimeHelper

java.lang.Object
io.atlasmap.converters.DateTimeHelper
public class DateTimeHelper extends Object
The helper class to handle date/time related conversion. The timezone string parameter is directly passed in to ZoneId.of(String).
